Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people who need to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate a device (string telephone) that the two people use to communicate.
The student can show that the device uses sound to send or receive information.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone that are important for communication, like the cups and the connecting string.
The student can demonstrate how using this device helps people communicate over long distances.
